jobs.title: Wipro Mega Drive 2026 - Oracle Applications Roles
jobs.excerpt: Wipro is hosting a Mega Drive on 28 February and 1 March 2026 across all Wipro locations for experienced professionals in Oracle Applications roles including Cloud Finance Functional, CCnB Technical, Apps Finance Functional, Oracle Fusion HCM Techno-Functional (ORC, Talent, Benefits, Compensation), and Cloud SCM Functional (Procurement & Inventory).

projects.title: Digital Decision-Support and Incentive Platform for Oil Palm Farmers
projects.excerpt: Digital Decision-Support and Incentive Platform for Oil Palm Farmers is a Smart India Hackathon project (SIH25276) under Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare (MoA&FW). Category: Software. Domain: Agriculture, FoodTech & Rural Development. Build a practical implementation with measurable outcomes and deployment-ready modules.
